MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL16 postcode area of Denbigh, affecting properties in Henllan and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because further investigations are required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:10PM on 25th October 2020
